Welcome to django-hint-tools’s documentation!¶

The idea of this python module is to add console tasks to your Django instance that help you in everyday tasks, such as building/updating a virtualenv, copying database from production to your local development machine, making a crontab file or running multiple instances of Django development server.

Task specification¶

  • tools_make_buildenv_script
